name: EvoTyrant The Next Evolution Version 1.0
description:
NOTE: This game will have weekly updates

  • 10 Playable Characters
  • 8 Weapon Types

GAMEPLAY

  • Help NPC's find towns to boost the population.
  • Fight Aliens, Mages, Orcs, Dwarves and Elves.
  • Lead large groups of warriors
  • Customize and control the World and NPC's
  • Collect weapons and companions

STORYLINE

Save the World from a Technologically Advanced Species of Aliens known as the EvoTyrants.
